__e: Then, you are the fool staying here
Yeah, well, orders or no orders, I've been around long enough to know I'd be a fool to trust someone from your team.
We're better off without that retarded brother of yours.
Why are you talking to me like I'm a jackass?
How can a man betray his wife when he doesn't even know if she's alive?
Even if you're an idiot, I don't see why you wanna die so young.
I've broken my parole, and I'm living in some dead guy's house!
Why, ya mug, don't ya know ya got stung?
He's a stupid little know-nothing not-knower.
A sightless fool who knows not where he stands!
Do you think I'm stupid? I have no eyes?
Yeah. But I was the one that let him become a nitwit. Now, I'm not taking the blame, mind you.
He may be a jackass, but he plays pretty good.
I know people think I'm stupid, but I'm not dumb.
This is not a fool, and I do not either.
So stop treating me like an idiot, OK? As if you don't know!
